title: LOGITECH M500 Mouse
description:
Here is my review of the Logitech M500 mouse. It's a budget mouse that has some very good features built in.
It sells for around £20 and above on Amazon.
It has Hyper Scrolling, Forward/Back Buttons, Left/Right Scroll, it's really comfortable to use and all the buttons can be customised and tweaked within the SetPoint Software.

Please subscribe for future tech reviews of all kinds.

Check out my links:

www.youtube.com/yonitechvids
www.geekslam.co.uk
